name: Sovereign Solar Power
overview:
Sovereign installation service has a wealth of knowledge and experience in making your dreams a reality. Our individual specialist teams of trades will work alongside you and you property to deliver a fist class service on time and on budget. From solar energy to central heating, right through to kitchens and bathrooms our service is first class.We also work very closely with major local authority’s as well being a local installer for a nationwide DIY chain. This responsibility has come through our dedication to detail as well as our excellent customer service levels and our professional teams of qualified tradesmen.All of our work is guaranteed, please call us today for a free quotation,no job is to big or small.
